summary: ["thierry henry has criticised arsenal 's recent dealings in the transfer window and has urged his former side to purchase four top players in the summer . sky sports pundit thierry henry questioned whether arsenal can win the title with olivier giroud in attack . sunderland -lrb- home -rrb- may 20 .", "thierry henry has criticised arsenal 's recent dealings in the transfer window and has urged his former side to purchase four top players in the summer . sky sports pundit thierry henry questioned whether arsenal can win the title with olivier giroud in attack . sunderland -lrb- home -rrb- may 20 .", "thierry henry has criticised arsenal 's recent dealings in the transfer window and has urged his former side to purchase four top players in the summer . sky sports pundit thierry henry questioned whether arsenal can win the title with olivier giroud in attack . sunderland -lrb- home -rrb- may 20 .", "thierry henry has criticised arsenal 's recent dealings in the transfer window and has urged his former side to purchase four top players in the summer . sky sports pundit thierry henry questioned whether arsenal can win the title with olivier giroud in attack . sunderland -lrb- home -rrb- may 20 ."]
aspect: ['1. Thierry Henry urges Arsenal to sign four top players in the summer transfer window to improve their chances of winning the league. ', '2. The Frenchman believes Arsenal need a goalkeeper, defensive midfielder, and striker to challenge for the title. ', '3. Henry also criticized Olivier Giroud, suggesting that he may not be enough to win the league. ', '4. Henry recommends Arsenal to buy players of similar quality to those Chelsea bought last season to challenge for the title.']
explain: ["This aspect of the information states that Arsenal's former player and current pundit Thierry Henry has expressed doubt about the team's ability to win the league with Olivier Giroud as the primary striker. He recommended Arsenal to sign four top players in the upcoming summer transfer window to enhance their capabilities of capturing the title.", "Thierry Henry, a Sky Sports pundit, questions Arsenal's ability to win the title with Olivier Giroud as their striker. He believes that the team needs a goalkeeper, defensive midfielder, and another striker to challenge for the title. In his opinion, even though Giroud has shown improvement, he does not think that he is good enough to lead the team to victory in the Premier League. Henry also highlights that they need to bring in high-quality players in these positions to strengthen the team's weaknesses.", "Thierry Henry, a former Arsenal player and current pundit, has expressed his opinion on the strength of Arsenal's squad after analyzing their recent transfer window activities. He suggests that the club needs to purchase more top-class players in order to have a strong team. Additionally, he questioned the ability of Olivier Giroud, Arsenal's current striker, to win the league.", 'According to Thierry Henry, to challenge for the title, Arsenal needs to buy players of similar quality to those Chelsea bought last season. This means that Henry believes Arsenal should invest in top-quality players to improve their squad and strengthen their chances of winning the league.']
answer: ["D: I don't think the summary contains the core idea.", 'Yes, the summary contains the core idea that Thierry Henry believes that Arsenal needs to sign a goalkeeper, defensive midfielder, and another striker to challenge for the title.', "\nNot really, the summary only mentions Henry's opinion about the transfer window and Giroud's ability, but it doesn't explicitly state the core idea about the need for Arsenal to purchase more top players. However, the aspect provided clarifies this idea.", 'The given aspect is not directly mentioned in the summary.']
